g.text: SOME CLUES:The images: what a vague video! What can you find from these pixelated images?The scenes: the scene showed in the video are literally the comparable usage sce-narios of the object which is pixelated! Even the white one is the real scene, which may be a wall, a table or anything else.Different angles of view: this video shows different angles of the object. Let us guess from these perspectives!The background music: this music is really messy! Some of them are related to these objects, while others are just technological noise!The colors: the color of these images is not necessarily true! They may all be matched by the computer automatically.YOUR ANSWERS ARE SUPPOSED TO INCLUDE:A piece of image to illustrate the object that you associate, which could be the existing objects or something nonexistent totally imagined by yourself ;What is the info from this video that helps you to associate this thing. You also need to upload images (up to four) in this part.While watching, you can do some drawing to record your thoughts or search pic-tures of the object you associate on the internet to answer the first question; take some screenshots to answer the second one.
你的答案需要包括：一张图片来描述您联想到的物品。这个物品可以是世界上存在的物品，也可以完全是你自己幻想出来的不存在的事物;视频中帮助您联想到这些物品的信息有哪些。在这一部分中您依旧需要上传图片，最多四张。在观看过程中，您可以进行一些画图记录自己的想法或着上网搜索相应物体的图片，来回答第一个问题；进行一些截图，来回答第二个问题。
//When you finish uploading, you can check the ‘ghostmap’ made by all of the participants (check answers) and leave a message or give a like to other answers.//
//当您完成上传后， 您可以查看由所有参与者共同创造的幽灵图集（check answers)，也可以对其他的进行留言或者点赞。//
